name: A crystalline memory retainer
data: It decreases the users dexterity adequately.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence impressively.
It increases the users hitpoints somewhat.
It has feeble armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impossibly much.
It increases the users psionic resistance tremendously.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
It gives great bonus to the spell 'restore memory'.
It gives great penalty to the skill 'dodge'.
It prevents the exfiltration of memories from the mind.
